articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: The 'bogan' Australian giving War & Peace an irreverent remake
articles.description: Ander Louis has written a new version of Leo Tolstoy's classic Russian novel in Australian slang.
articles.content:
At first glance Tolstoy's book, filled with the lives of rich, powerful Russians, seems worlds apart from modern-day Australia.
But Louis argues bogan is the ultimate equaliser as the informal slang… [+1518 chars]

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: TikTok sticking out tongue trend: Victim in Finsbury Park speaks out
articles.description: For a second time, I've faced disability harassment. Here's what I learned by reporting it.
articles.content:
"Stop them!" I shouted, as I sped through London's Finsbury Park station in my electric wheelchair. I was surrounded by commuters. Nobody intervened.
I had been travelling alone and was checking my … [+1487 chars]

articles.title: The Barking Dog quiz cheating: BBC visits pub - and sees the questions
articles.description: The weekly pub quiz at the Barking Dog in Urmston returns after a cheating team was rumbled.
articles.content:
Huddled around their tables, locals poured into The Barking Dog each week to take on a pub quiz - but one thing was amiss.

articles.title: Trump says he will sue BBC for at least $1bn over Panorama edit
articles.description: The US president told reporters on Air Force One that he will take legal action against the broadcaster and will call Sir Keir Starmer over the weekend.
